entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Canmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:01 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Banff 06:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

Humidity: 45 %
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries near the British Columbia border early this morning. Snow level 1800 metres lowering to valley bottom this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this evening. Local amount 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
